description:
*Novocirkusová groteska, báseň, obraz i noční běs.* Cirk La Putyka se ve svém novém představení tentokrát zaměřuje na lidskou osobnost, konkrétně na takzvanou poruchu pozornosti s hyperaktivitou známou pod anglickou zkratkou ADHD. Ve stejnojmenné inscenaci se v režii Rostislava Nováka ml., kterému jako dítěti byla tato porucha diagnostikována, představí osm výjimečných novocirkusových umělců z Finska, Venezuely, Kanady, Španělska, Belgie, Nizozemska a Francie. Jeden z nejlepších světových žonglérů, akrobaté na tyči, cyr wheelu, kolečkových bruslích, tanečníci i akrobat visící za vlasy. Soubor tak divákům nabídne „nejnovocirkusovější“ podívanou za několik posledních let. Zároveň je ale cílem představení upozornit na to, že ADHD není onemocnění, ale nová kvalita života. _‚‚Kdybych neměl ADHD, nikdy bych nedokázal vytvořit naši company, nikdy bych nezaložil Jatka78. Kdybych něměl ADHD, nikdy bych nezačal sportovat ani malovat. Mám ADHD a díky němu dokážu tvořit. Unavit sám sebe, ale i své okolí. Mám ADHD a díky němu dokážu ničit sám sebe, ale i své okolí. Mám ADHD a díky němu dokážu zničit sám sebe, ale i své okolí. Já sám hledám řád v chaosu. Já sám hledám radost v chaosu. Já sám hledám úsměv v chaosu. Občas ale cítím, že mi exploduje mozek, a pak jsem sám. Nechci být sám, chci být s vámi.‘‘_ Rostislav Novák ml.
Umělecké skupiny: Cirk La Putyka

This year will be the 5th annual _Prague Ice Cream_ Festival. In addition to all kinds of ice cream, you can enjoy various games, competitions and workshops. This year, you will be able to vote in the contest for the most popular ice cream maker of the festival, and the prize for the best ice cream will be announced.
Umělecké skupiny: MorcheebaKraftwerkPrimal ScreamLiam GallagherAnna CalviJungleLauran HibberdKhoibaThe IllsPražský výběrKAMP!Ohm SquareWWW NeurobeatFloexManon meurtKatarziaBlackwave

Druhý ročník elektronického _UP Music Festivalu_ bude probíhat na ve dnech 13. a 14. července 2018. Tématem dalšího ročníku bude „Harmony in Nature“ – v návaznosti na tuto myšlenku budou organizátoři _„prezentovat festival prostřednictvím zvuků a tvarů lesa, jehož je umění hlavní součástí“_.

Více info o programu brzy.

_What can keep you alive when the whole world stands against you?_ Ema Černá, child hero, the new production of Viktor Tauš, based on a true story, can eventually overcome this situation. The most essential part of the will to survive is true belief in oneself, the belief that somewhere, perhaps in America, someone waits who cares for you.
Autor: David Jařab, Evita Naušová
Režisér: Viktor Tauš
Umělci: Tereza Voříšková, Eliška Křenková

_Breakdown – a part of our lives, everyday experience that ruins and crushes us. Breakdown also constructs, hardens, strengthens or just routinely returns without us noticing and realizing its presence. Without breakdown it is impossible to push one’s limits, to leap forward, it is impossible to jump over one’s shadow. We are interested in the character of breakdown, what it does to an individual and whole society._
Umělecké skupiny: Losers Cirque Company
Autor: Petr Horníček, Tomsa Legierski, Matyáš Ramba
Režisér: Tomsa Legierski
Umělci: Petr Horníček, Lukáš Macháček, Matyáš Ramba, Vítězslav Ramba, Jana Telcová, Kristýna Stránská, Martina Illichová, Nikola Kopáčová, Ondřej Sochůrek, Jiří Bělka, Josefina Žampová, Vladimír Mikláš

*Stage radio report about the discovery of a crazy Czech band Proton, which was silenced just before it became famous.* Striking story of a forgotten musical legend from which the giants of both popular music and underground have been awaiting much more. With the musical star of the dark sky of deep normalisation, there is an unbelievable amount of incredible stories of contemporary musicians.
Umělecké skupiny: Vosto5

Režisér: Ondřej Cihlář
Umělci: Ondřej Bauer, Ondřej Cihlář, Jiří Havelka / Robert Mikluš, Tomina Jeřábek, Petr Marek, Petr Prokop a Bára Mišíková

Dnes již legendární La Putyka, inscenace roku 2009, kombinuje akrobacii, tanec, loutky a sportovní výkony v originálním pojetí nového cirkusu, jenž nahlíží na atmosféru české putyky skelným pohledem střízlivého půllitru. Objevuje hospodskou fantazii a změněnou realitu, kdy na chvíli přestávají platit fyzikální zákony a diváci jsou svědky nečekaných akrobatických, hudebních i pohybových jevů. Co se honí v hlavách hospodských štamgastů, to předvádějí mistři ČR v akrobatických skocích na trampolíně, profesionální tanečníci nebo mistr bojového umění wu-shu. Originální pojetí inscenace vychází z českých reálií hospodského života.
Umělecké skupiny: Cirk La Putyka
Umělci: Jiří Kohout, Petr Horníček, Michal Boltnar, Jiří Weissmann, Lenka Vágnerová, Pavel Mašek, Petr Dejl, Daniel Komarov, Tereza Toběrná, Zbyněk Šporc, Vojtěch Fülep, Rostislav Novák, Anna Schmidtmajerová, Vojtěch Fülep

_Honey_ is a love story based on real events. Two sets are played together, and their artistic means are completely different. That is why the idea of ​​working together has arisen. And the desire to combine the authentic personality and chamber dramatic acting of Dejvicka Theater with an equally authentic pure stage "being" expressed by the elements of Cirk La Putyk's new circus so that something new, perhaps surprising, and definitely original, is created. They always create something that has not yet occurred in such symbiosis. It is definitely not about creating a first-rate attraction, but a powerful experience that enriches not only the artists of both theaters during the creative process, but which primarily affects all the senses of the viewer.
Umělecké skupiny: Cirk La PutykaDejvické divadlo
Autor: Miroslav Krobot, Lubomír Smékal
Režisér: Miroslav Krobot
Umělci: Jan Balcar, Šárka Bočková, Jenovéfa Boková, Vojtěch Fülep / Ondřej Malý, Jana Holcová, Jiří Kohout, Daniel Komarov, Lenka Krobotová, Tereza Nádvorníková, Václav Neužil, Jaroslav Plesl, Vladimír Polívka, Anna Schmidtmajerová, Alexandr Volný, Jiří Weissmann

*Contemporary circus grotesque, poem, painting as well as dark fury.* _"If I did not have ADHD, I would never have been able to create our company. I would never have established Jatka78. If I did not have ADHD, I would never start sports our paint. I have ADHD and thanks to it I can tire myself but also my surroundings. I have ADHD and thanks to it I can ravage myself but also my surroundings. I have ADHD and thanks to it I can destroy myself but also my surroundings. I have ADHD and thanks to it I can create. I myself seek order in chaos. I myself seek joy in chaos. I myself seek smile in chaos. Sometimes I feel my brain will explode and then I am alone. I do not want to be alone, I want to be with you."_ Rostislav Novák Jr.
Umělecké skupiny: Cirk La Putyka

I do not want to be alone, I want to be with you."_ Rostislav Novák Jr.
Umělecké skupiny: Cirk La Putyka

Unique Theatrical Meetings of Yesterday's Film Heroes – This is the basis of the story that you will be guided through by someone who hasn't left the movies to this day. A little director, a bit of a ticket taker, a bit of a projectionist, a bit of a popcorn salesman, but especially an old friend to the now forgotten silver screen heroes – big, small, invisible, inventive, tender, and spooky. Their common stories will be accompanied by a pianist, just as it was during silent films. _Biograf_ is for lovers of cinemas of all ages.
Umělecké skupiny: Cirk La Putyka
Autor: Marek Zákostelecký, Jiří Kohout, František Karel Tománek
Režisér: Marek Zákostelecký, Jiří Kohout, František Karel Tománek
Umělci: Jiří Kohout, Jan Čtvrtník

Kalevala, The Peloponnesian War, Dürer’s Melancholia, Fruček, Kapetanea, Novák senior, Novák junior., Mantzoukis, Záveská, Musa, Athens, Prague, Cirk La Putyka, Rootlessroot, combat, tears, hug, embrace, alcohol, laugh, madness, childhood, old age, hyperactivity, support, 1948/1979/2016. Black Black Wood, place of meeting of the father and the son. Some rules cannot be broken; they already are in force for thousands of years. _„Jozef Fruček asked me if show that I want to produce, shall enjoy a success in Prague, or show, which shall infringe limits of the present performance art in general. Guess, what was my answer."_ - Rostislav Novák Jr. *The rules of the black black woods * From 6.30 to 9 pm, the audience is encouraged to take a break whenever needed, whether for refreshment or bathroom errands. The door to the theatre hall shall be shut at 9.00, after which time no one shall be allowed to enter due to a high number of performers in the space. We thank you for respecting these rules and for your understanding. Come and stop for a couple of hours and revel in the beauty of the black black woods. *Partly in Czech.*
Umělecké skupiny: Cirk La Putyka
Režisér: Jozef Fruček, Linda Kapetanea
Umělci: Rostislav Novák ml., Rostislav Novák st.

_Breakdown – a part of our lives, everyday experience that ruins and crushes us. Breakdown also constructs, hardens, strengthens or just routinely returns without us noticing and realizing its presence. Without breakdown it is impossible to push one’s limits, to leap forward, it is impossible to jump over one’s shadow. We are interested in the character of breakdown, what it does to an individual and whole society._
Umělecké skupiny: Losers Cirque Company
Autor: Petr Horníček, Tomsa Legierski, Matyáš Ramba
Režisér: Tomsa Legierski
Umělci: Petr Horníček, Lukáš Macháček, Matyáš Ramba, Vítězslav Ramba, Jana Telcová, Kristýna Stránská, Martina Illichová, Nikola Kopáčová, Ondřej Sochůrek, Jiří Bělka, Josefina Žampová, Vladimír Mikláš

_Co vás dokáže udržet při životě, když proti vám stojí celý svět a jste ještě dítě?_ Ema Černá, dětská hrdinka nové inscenace Viktora Tauše, inspirované skutečnými osudy, dokáže nakonec překonat i tuto situaci. Nejpodstatnější součástí vůle k přežití je totiž víra v sebe sama, víra, že někde daleko, třeba v Americe, čeká někdo, komu na vás záleží. Ema Černá na své cestě překoná dětský domov, pěstounskou péči i „pasťák“. A to v době, kdy proti ní nestojí pouze instituce, ale i režim státu. _Amerikánka_ je sondou do historie 80. let v Československu, ale stejně tak je to ryze současné drama o svobodě a touze žít. *Pro diváky od 15 let.*
Autor: David Jařab, Evita Naušová
Režisér: Viktor Tauš
Umělci: Tereza Voříšková, Eliška Křenková

_What can keep you alive when the whole world stands against you?_ Ema Černá, child hero, the new production of Viktor Tauš, based on a true story, can eventually overcome this situation. The most essential part of the will to survive is true belief in oneself, the belief that somewhere, perhaps in America, someone waits who cares for you.
Autor: David Jařab, Evita Naušová
Režisér: Viktor Tauš
Umělci: Tereza Voříšková, Eliška Křenková

Forceful and funny, powerful and poetic, _La Putyka_ explores Czech pub culture through glazed eyes and beery breath... This energising, intensely vibrant spectacle fuses acrobatics, dance, theatre, puppets and live music into original contemporary circus that wins awards.

_Honey_ is a love story based on real events. Two sets are played together, and their artistic means are completely different. That is why the idea of ​​working together has arisen. And the desire to combine the authentic personality and chamber dramatic acting of Dejvicka Theater with an equally authentic pure stage "being" expressed by the elements of Cirk La Putyk's new circus so that something new, perhaps surprising, and definitely original, is created. They always create something that has not yet occurred in such symbiosis. It is definitely not about creating a first-rate attraction, but a powerful experience that enriches not only the artists of both theaters during the creative process, but which primarily affects all the senses of the viewer.
Umělecké skupiny: Cirk La PutykaDejvické divadlo

Rejoicer se začal v hudebním světě pohybovat v roce 2006, kdy se věnoval hlavně jungle a drum'n'bass. Později přešel k hip hopu a produkoval hudbu pod přezdívkou Guadaloop. V roce 2009 založil label Raw Tapes a od té doby vydal více než 20 alb pod různými aliasy. V roce 2011 založil kapelu Buttering Trio s KerenDunem a Beno Hendlerem a vydal LP _Toast_. Nedávno mu vyšlo nové album _Energy Dreams_ na Stones Throw Records a 31. ledna s ním zavítá do klubu Cross.
Umělecké skupiny: Rejoicer

*Stage radio report about the discovery of a crazy Czech band Proton, which was silenced just before it became famous.* Striking story of a forgotten musical legend from which the giants of both popular music and underground have been awaiting much more. _What can keep you alive when the whole world stands against you?_ Ema Černá, child hero, the new production of Viktor Tauš, based on a true story, can eventually overcome this situation. The most essential part of the will to survive is true belief in oneself, the belief that somewhere, perhaps in America, someone waits who cares for you.

*Contemporary circus grotesque, poem, painting as well as dark fury.* _"If I did not have ADHD, I would never have been able to create our company. I would never have established Jatka78. If I did not have ADHD, I would never start sports our paint. I have ADHD and thanks to it I can tire myself but also my surroundings. I have ADHD and thanks to it I can ravage myself but also my surroundings. I have ADHD and thanks to it I can destroy myself but also my surroundings. I have ADHD and thanks to it I can create. I myself seek order in chaos. I myself seek joy in chaos. I myself seek smile in chaos. Sometimes I feel my brain will explode and then I am alone. I do not want to be alone, I want to be with you."_ Rostislav Novák Jr.
Umělecké skupiny: Cirk La Putyka

Unique Theatrical Meetings of Yesterday's Film Heroes – This is the basis of the story that you will be guided through by someone who hasn't left the movies to this day. A little director, a bit of a ticket taker, a bit of a projectionist, a bit of a popcorn salesman, but especially an old friend to the now forgotten silver screen heroes – big, small, invisible, inventive, tender, and spooky. Their common stories will be accompanied by a pianist, just as it was during silent films. _Biograf_ is for lovers of cinemas of all ages.
Umělecké skupiny: Cirk La Putyka
Autor: Marek Zákostelecký, Jiří Kohout, František Karel Tománek
Režisér: Marek Zákostelecký, Jiří Kohout, František Karel Tománek
Umělci: Jiří Kohout, Jan Čtvrtník

_12,000 litres of water, 1.5 tons of steel, 4 glass walls and 1 actress._ *After three years of preparation, which included working with stress analysts, glassmakers and water managers as well as challenging rehearsing in pools, Vít Neznal & Co. present a unique physical theater production.* _The world around us is constantly changing and we are forced to adapt. We cannot predict what happens tomorrow, in a week or in a month. We live in uncertainty, and in uncertainty, no one can be happy. Or can they?_ The play takes place in an aquarium in an otherwise unavailable industrial space and is created by the director Vít Neznal and a prominent Czech choreographer Dora Sulženko Hoštová in co-production with the festival _Letní Letná_ and the space Jatka78. The solo role is performed by the young actress and dancer Kateřina Dvořáková who was nominated for the Talent of the Year award in 2017. _“My goal here was to come up with a play inspired by what I've seen throughout the whole world - with dominant scenography which sets the tone for the whole production. The Unbearable Liquidity of Being is a story of a man who is struggling to come to terms with the uncertainty of today's world as well as the one of his own and trying to foresee the unforeseeable. A man, who must be ready for rain despite the clear forecast,”_ says Vít Neznal.
Autor: Vít Neznal, Kateřina Dvořáková
Režisér: Vít Neznal
Umělci: Kateřina Dvořáková

Umělci: Kateřina Dvořáková

_12,000 litres of water, 1.5 tons of steel, 4 glass walls and 1 actress._ *After three years of preparation, which included working with stress analysts, glassmakers and water managers as well as challenging rehearsing in pools, Vít Neznal & Co. present a unique physical theater production.* _The world around us is constantly changing and we are forced to adapt. We cannot predict what happens tomorrow, in a week or in a month. We live in uncertainty, and in uncertainty, no one can be happy. Or can they?_ The play takes place in an aquarium in an otherwise unavailable industrial space and is created by the director Vít Neznal and a prominent Czech choreographer Dora Sulženko Hoštová in co-production with the festival _Letní Letná_ and the space Jatka78. The solo role is performed by the young actress and dancer Kateřina Dvořáková who was nominated for the Talent of the Year award in 2017. _“My goal here was to come up with a play inspired by what I've seen throughout the whole world - with dominant scenography which sets the tone for the whole production. The Unbearable Liquidity of Being is a story of a man who is struggling to come to terms with the uncertainty of today's world as well as the one of his own and trying to foresee the unforeseeable. A man, who must be ready for rain despite the clear forecast,”_ says Vít Neznal.
Autor: Vít Neznal, Kateřina Dvořáková
Režisér: Vít Neznal
Umělci: Kateřina Dvořáková

_Nick_ is a story about a boy from Texas who disappears at the age of thirteen. The year is 1994 and gradually a story unfolds about his sister’s relentless effort at finding him and her eventual success, about a merry reunion with the family and about everything that followed. But what if things are not what they seem to be? Some stories are so fictitious that we simply believe them, whether we wish to or not. New perspectives and new data can change our interpretation of events. Each single piece of information is an important part of a jigsaw, whatever place it falls into. What and under what circumstances are we willing to believe in? It is up to the spectators to put together a story and decide whether it deserves their trust.

*Some Like It Short is a festival for smartphone amateur filmmakers, a once-in-a-while opportunity to jump from your Bio Oko seat to the big screen.*

Wanna compete? The formula is simple: any person with a sparkle of movie passion can submit a short film under 6:17 minutes before the below deadline. An arbitrary selection of 10 videos will be screened in Oko and a (not very much) professional jury will choose the best ones.

Off competition: those willing to shoot something quick, funny and stress-free are invited to send a 1 minute max video telling something about Climate change. Fake doc? Fake news? Fake advertising? Fake weather forecast? Whatever. Just do the thing. Go crazy. A selection will be screened before the competing movies.

*Participants:* Michael Rowland, Zlatko Teskere and Kolektiv Bellova-Teskere-Vraspirova, Mateusz Bujnowski, Mezera Plavečky, Daniel Plavečky, Urša Prah, Jessica Debecová, Vincent Lejeune, Martin Bohadlo, Kamila K. Hlochova

Od Nového roku pokračuje oblíbený cyklus neformálních setkání se starostou Janem Čižinským a dalšími radními Prahy 7 v sedmičkových hospůdkách a kavárnách. Opět se budete moci vedení městské části ptát na to, co vás zajímá, nebo jim sdělit, co máte na srdci. První setkání v roce 2019 se uskuteční ve čtvrtek 17. 1. od 18.00 hod. v pivnici Kovadlina U lázní (Kostelní 360/8). Těšit se na Vás bude kromě starosty také místostarostka pro oblast kultury, sportu a sousedských vztahů Hana Třeštíková.

Městská část Praha 7 a ARCHIP vás srdečně zvou na výstavu studentských návrhů integrace Libeňského mostu do organismu města. Soubor projektů vytvořili mezinárodní studenti vysoké školy architektury ARCHIP. Vernisáž výstavy se uskuteční ve čtvrtek 17. ledna, v 16:30 hodin v uliční galerii Výloha Milada (Poliklinika Prahy 7, na rohu ulic Milady Horákové a Františka Křížka).

Na projektu revitalizace mostu pracovali studenti z ateliéru vedeného architekty René Dleskem a Tamarou Horovou. Výstava MOST MĚSTU – MĚSTU MOST představuje šest nejzajímavějších prací zabývajících se novou vizí Libeňského mostu. 

Výstava potrvá do 28. února 2019.

location: Galerie na Úřadě MČ Praha 7, 2. patro, nábř. Kpt. Jaroše 1000
description:
Další z výstav v Galerii na úřadě bude patřit obrazům Sylwie Svorové Pawelkowicz. Autorčinou inspirací byla banální návštěva kluziště, kde vířící krasobruslařky obklopovali rychle bruslící hokejisté.  „Fascinovaly mě tváře bruslařů koncentrovaných na dokonalé provedení pohybu. Nejdůležitější bylo to, aby nožka byla postavena s grácií, pirueta vypadala elegantně a kluziště bylo ještě rychleji obkrouženo. Samy obrazy jsou formální zábavou s bílou – jejími odstíny a subtilními kontrasty – spolu s černěmi a šedí. Takové moje hledání barev zimy,“ řekla k výstavě autorka.

Vernisáž se uskuteční 16. ledna od 17.30 hodin v druhém patře radnice, Kpt. Jaroše 1000. Výstava s názvem Bruslaři bude k vidění do 22. února.

The most personal project to date from Academy Award (R)-winning director and writer Alfonso Cuarón (_Gravity, Children of Men, Y Tu Mama Tambien_), _Roma_ follows Cleo (Yalitza Aparicio), a young domestic worker for a family in the middle-class neighborhood of Roma in Mexico City. Delivering an artful love letter to the women who raised him, Cuarón draws on his own childhood to create a vivid and emotional portrait of domestic strife and social hierarchy amidst political turmoil of the 1970s.
Režisér: Alfonso Cuarón
Umělci: Yalitza Aparicio, Marina de Tavira, Diego Cortina Autrey, Carlos Peralta, Marco Graf, Daniela Demesa, Nancy García García, Verónica García, Andy Cortés, Fernando Grediaga, Jorge Antonio Guerrero

Downcast Bertrand is suffering a midlife crisis. When he answers an ad placed by a group looking for a new member for their male synchronised swimming team (we’re talking aquabeaux here), he has no idea that the amateur squad will not only bring him new friends but also a new lease of life. A comedy about holding your breath for as long as it takes to ensure life goes swimmingly.
Režisér: Gilles Lellouche
Umělci: Guillaume Canet, Leïla Bekhti, Mathieu Amalric, Virginie Efira, Benoît Poelvoorde, Jean-Hugues Anglade, Marina Foïs, Noée Abita, Mélanie Doutey, Jonathan Zaccaï, Erika Sainte, Philippe Katerine, Félix Moati, Anderz Eide, Alban Ivanov, Claire Nadeau, Ian McCamy

An unemployed pop-culture devourer from Los Angeles would like to do something sensible, but temporarily stop at masturbating and playing Nintendo. The mysterious disappearance of an attractive girl from the neighborhood, however, will wake up in the youth of the tireless Philip Marlowe. The information about the conspiracy is guided by Sam's information encoded on old VHS, Hollywood locations, characters on the walls, songs and comics.
Režisér: David Robert Mitchell
Umělci: Sydney Sweeney, Topher Grace, Riley Keough, Jimmi Simpson, Andrew Garfield, Riki Lindhome, Callie Hernandez, Grace Van Patten, Zosia Mamet

The captivating story of the band Queen, his music and amazing vocalist Freddie Mercury, who has broken stereotypes and conventions, won the worship of countless fans. The film shows the brilliant career of the band, which, thanks to iconic songs and revolutionary sound, climbed to the heights of fame until Mercury's scandalous lifestyle did not put everything into question
Režisér: Bryan Singer
Umělci: Rami Malek, Joseph Mazzello, Gwilym Lee, Ben Hardy, Allen Leech

Decades after her original visit, the magical nanny returns to help the Banks siblings and Michael's children through a difficult time in their lives.
Režisér: Rob Marshall

The production of _Batacchio_ is inspired by the poetry of old nomadic theater companies that freely combined in their performances all sorts of human skills and creations: from circus figures and theatrical and music scenes to the miracles of the new technologies at that time to the demonstrations of the anatomical anomalies of animals and humans. _Batacchio_ will captivate you with the atmosphere of an old shadow full of magical tricks, breathtaking acrobatics, and humor. On the stage, seven acrobats and actors will appear in an unusual combination of new circus disciplines with those you will not see on the stage anymore.
Umělecké skupiny: Cirk La Putyka
Autor: Maksim Komaro

Režisér: Jiří Holba
Umělci: Karel „Charlie“ Soukup

Režisér: Alfonso Cuarón
Umělci: Yalitza Aparicio, Marina de Tavira, Diego Cortina Autrey, Carlos Peralta, Marco Graf, Daniela Demesa, Nancy García García, Verónica García, Andy Cortés, Fernando Grediaga, Jorge Antonio Guerrero

location: Alfred ve dvoře, Františka Křížka 36, Praha 7
description:
This international collective whirls together new music, movement and imagery in an intermedial performance on history's endless rotation. _Everywhen_ orbits around two sides of life - the personal and the political. An often caring, gentle and well-meaning personal life is contrasted here with the reality of the social individual, who can often be sinister, vengeful and hateful. But how can we be critical to our own world views when they are created by those closest to us? A woman as loving mother who also promotes murder and slavery; a loving couple involved in the propaganda of a perverse ideology; kids that give a fascist salute as if in play. Something is wrong in these scenes. Images of everyday families, mums and dads with their children, tiny groups of people, close to each other, face to face with the threat of history repeating itself. Our memories often surface suddenly, changed, idealized, and sometimes they even erase themselves spontaneously. By leaving out key events and rewriting history a barrier is built between the new generation and older people, and this is makes it too easy for history to repeat itself. Is it even possible to stop history from repeating itself when ideology is written into the body like DNA? An intimate situation in a frightfully familiar context.
Autor: Soňa Ferienčíková, Mária Júdová, Alexandra Timpau

event_name: Zdeněk Novák: Ráj a zahrady související

location: Alfred ve dvoře, Františka Křížka 36, Praha 7
description:
Dangerous Theatre is a cult puppet theatre, led by an artist František Antonín Skála. This theatre group whom is almost virtually impossible to catch a sight of and are rarely seen in public. Dangerous Theatre is one of the mysterious multidisciplinary group LSJ, and works with a classical puppet theatre format, replacing dramatic situations with real dangers where all the characters are gradually coming to a miserable end. Grotesque sketches of Dangerous Theatre are built on scenographic effects and suicidal events of puppets, which are often carefully cut from root vegetables or other unusual materials. Their short stage life is ended by cutting, crushing in a blender or obliterating explosions. All performances are preceded by a thorough theoretical preparation that goes hand in hand with the absence of practical rehearsals. The resulting technological and rendering improvisation creates tension and brings into play the element of unpredictability and real danger that often threatens not only actors but also audiences. The first row is only for those who dare! Suitable for adventurous children and their guidance.

*Throught performance pyrotechnical effects, various electrical machines and apparatuses are used.*
*Authors:* Václav Krčál, Mikuláš Adamovský, Václav Mašek, František Antonín Skála

location: Alfred ve dvoře, Františka Křížka 36, Praha 7
description:
This is a story of brotherhood – a relationship as extreme, incomprehensible, pure, irreplaceable, and limitless as the conquering of the highest mountain. A relationship of life and death. A performance on passion for mountain-climbing, on perserverance, humility, overcoming your limits and on the unique power of the mountains. On unbridled, infinite freedom and on keeping your head in the clouds. On the split-seconds during which you can make irreversible decisions about your fate. The project is inspired by Günther and Reinhold Messner’s ascent of the Rupal face of the Nanga Parbat in the Himalayas, and the death of the younger of the two brothers. It is also a statement on the power of the media, which on the one hand helped Reinhold raise financing for his further expeditions, bringing attention to him and to mountain climbing in general. On the other hand the media hounded him, making him seem responsible for his brother’s death. What’s harder, to survive in the most extreme weather conditions, to withstand the pressures of the media, or to cope with the death of a brother?
Umělecké skupiny: Wariot Ideal
Umělci: Vojta Švejda, Jan Kalivoda, Jan Dörner, Milena Fabiánová, Ivanka Kanhauserová, Jiří Rouš, David Šmitmajer, Stéphanie N'Duhirahe, Kryštof Pešek

location: Alfred ve dvoře, Františka Křížka 36, Praha 7
description:
This is a story of brotherhood – a relationship as extreme, incomprehensible, pure, irreplaceable, and limitless as the conquering of the highest mountain. A relationship of life and death. A performance on passion for mountain-climbing, on perserverance, humility, overcoming your limits and on the unique power of the mountains. On unbridled, infinite freedom and on keeping your head in the clouds. On the split-seconds during which you can make irreversible decisions about your fate. The project is inspired by Günther and Reinhold Messner’s ascent of the Rupal face of the Nanga Parbat in the Himalayas, and the death of the younger of the two brothers. It is also a statement on the power of the media, which on the one hand helped Reinhold raise financing for his further expeditions, bringing attention to him and to mountain climbing in general. On the other hand the media hounded him, making him seem responsible for his brother’s death. What’s harder, to survive in the most extreme weather conditions, to withstand the pressures of the media, or to cope with the death of a brother?
Umělecké skupiny: Wariot Ideal
Umělci: Vojta Švejda, Jan Kalivoda, Jan Dörner, Milena Fabiánová, Ivanka Kanhauserová, Jiří Rouš, David Šmitmajer, Stéphanie N'Duhirahe, Kryštof Pešek

event_name: Přednáška – Příběhy módy – Život – oděv – lidé
description:
Moderní žena pro Československou republiku, aneb od korzetu ke kalhotám?

Vznik Československé republiky v roce 1918 nebyl jen milníkem v dějinách státu, ale i ve vývoji ženského odívání. V souvislostech právě nabytého volebního práva, získané rovnoprávnosti s muži a možnosti vysokoškolského vzdělání se vyvíjel i vztah žen k vlastnímu tělu, oděvu a životnímu stylu. Přednáška se zaměří na ženské osobnosti, které pomáhaly formovat moderní československou ženu, především Milenu Jesenkou, jejíž eseje ovlivňovaly estetické cítění tisíců žen. Cesta k moderní ženě vyvrcholila v závěru 20. let na brněnské výstavě Civilisovaná žena, kde prezentovala Božena Horneková, později provdaná za architekta Rothmayera, neuvěřitelně moderní – až revoluční návrhy dámského šatníku založeného čistě na kalhotách.

Přednáší PhDr. Miroslava Burianová

Miroslava Burianová vystudovala historii na FF UK. Pracuje jako kurátorka sbírky novodobé módy a textilu a sbírky domácnost Národního muzea. Odborně se zaměřuje na životní styl osobností v první polovině 20. století. Je autorkou či spoluautorkou řady výstav: např. Republika, Zlatá? Šedesátá, Retro a aktuálně výstavy nejvzácnějších předmětů ze sbírek Národního muzea 2 x 100. Je autorkou řady odborných článků a publikací, například Karel a Naděžda Kramářovi doma, Hradní fotoarchiv, Móda v ulicích protektorátu a nejnověji Retro – 200 let inspirací.

event_name: Přednáška – Příběhy módy – Život – oděv – lidé
description:
Elegance osobností první republiky – identita a styl

Pojem elegance je s obdobím první republiky spojován více než s kteroukoli jinou dobou. Přednáška představí módu poněkud netradičně, nikoli za pomoci módních kreseb a fotografií, ale manekýnkami se stanou dámy zvučných jmen, dámy z elitních vrstev prvorepublikové společnosti, které byly zákaznicemi známých módních závodů, pohybovaly se na garden party, cestovaly k moři a jako vzor pro ženy se objevovaly na stránkách společenských časopisů. Posluchači se mohou těšit na oděvy i dobové fotografie slavných hereček, manželek politiků a diplomatů, ale i na fotografie zajímavých gentlemanů a samotného prezidenta republiky Tomáše Garrigue Masaryka.

event_name: Přednáška – Příběhy módy – Život – oděv – lidé
description:
Jazzové éra v šatníku paní vyslancové – charlestonky Anny Plesingerové-Božinové

Přednáška představí napínavý příběh života a luxusní společenské šaty paní Anny Plesingerové-Božinové, talentované malířky a manželky člena Maffie, sekretáře prezidenta Masaryka a významného prvorepublikového diplomata – Miroslava Plesingera-Božinova. Zaměřuje se na oděv jako výrazný projev její osobnosti, jejího vztahu k umění, k reprezentaci, ale odráží i proměny životní úrovně rodiny. Časově je příspěvek vymezen obdobím, kdy spolu s manželem pobývala ve Francii, Holandsku a Dánsku, tj. dobou Plesingerova působení v diplomatických službách 1919–1933.

event_name: Přednáška – Příběhy módy – Život – oděv – lidé
description:
Dvě stě let svatební módy

Celá staletí byly sňatek a následné mateřství považovány za náplň života ženy od královen po děvečky. Významu svatebního obřadu proto odpovídal i slavnostní oděv, který si ten den nevěsta oblékala. Přednáška představí nejen vývoj módy, ale bude se věnovat kontextu konkrétních svatebních šatů, proměnám svatebních zvyků a rituálů. To vše zasadí do příběhů známých i méně známých nevěst, královen, princezen, spisovatelek, hereček, ale i běžných žen, které zanechaly svědectví o jednom z nejvýznamnějších okamžiků svého života tím, že věnovaly své svatební šaty do sbírky Národního muzea.

event_name: Přednáška – Příběhy módy – Život – oděv – lidé
description:
Fenomém retro – věčné návraty módy

Retro to nejsou jen šusťákové pláště, dederonové košile a bruselský design. Význam slova retro je mnohem širší, označuje návrat do minulosti bez časového vymezení. Přednáška je věnována souvislostem mezi současnou módou a jejími minulými vzory. Dotkne se fenoménu vintage, retro kopií i tvorby současných designérů, návrhářů a konfekce, neboť ti všichni, někdy cíleně, někdy mimoděk, reinterpretují minulé vzory napříč staletími. Ostatně sama Coco Chanel to komentovala: „Plakala bych, kdyby mě nikdo nikdy neokopíroval.“

location_address: Dům č. p. 858 – Ostrov Štvanice, Praha

description:
London producer, Catching Flies, in its gentle electronics, can capture all shades of downtempo, from hip hop, soul to jazz. His music might be familiar for fans of Flying Lotus, Caribou and Bonobo, who he supported during their grand European tour in 2014. Catching Flies has received great attention after his last single _Satisfied_, and is about to release his debut album soon. Music magazines state his name will resonate in 2019 and this will be his first visit to Prague. The second guest of the evening will be only 22-year-old Poté, A Caribbean-born producer who uniquely blends music and instruments of different cultures into his own music, and who found inspiration in drums and percussion. He recently released his debut LP _Spiral, My Love_ and you could see him last year as a Bonobo forerunner during their tour.
Umělecké skupiny: Catching FliesPoté

location: Alfred ve dvoře, Františka Křížka 36, Praha 7
description: An inter-media performance about ever-repeating history, equipped with the ambience to completely captivate any audience: physically challenging dance, compelling music and dizzily rotating 3D visuals. The international team is formed by the dancer Sona Ferienčíková, the musician of Alexandra Timpau and the visual artist Mária Judová. Together in _Everywhen_ they capture the contrast between a loving personal life and a political life that can have terrible consequences.

16-year-old Hormoz is married to Hendi, three years his junior, after he promises that he can work as a miner. But the young man finds closed doors instead of a job. When Hendi becomes pregnant unexpectedly, Hormoz is forced to make an ill-advised pact with a smuggler.
Režisér: Abbas Amini
Umělci: Hamed Alipour, Zohreh Eslami

A small child and her elderly neighbor are having all kinds of small adventures in the streets of Tehran to get a sack of rice.
Režisér: Mohammad-Ali Talebi
Umělci: Jairan Abadzade

_Birthday Night_ / Omid Shams / 23 min. – As two close friends drive home on a dark abandoned road, a horrific accident by the side of the road derails their otherwise joyous journey home.

_Lunch Time_ / Alireza Ghasemi / 16 min. – When a 16 year old girl comes to the hospital to identify the body of her dead mother, little do the hospital staff know about the real intentions behind her apparently innocent request.

_Voltage_ / Samira Ghahremai / 16 min. – Lizzy summons up her last bit of hope to get something going with a DJ she loves, when she is asked to drive him to a party.

_A Moon in Wane_ / Ali Derakhshandeh / 22 min. – To fulfill a will, a man drives off to transfer a dead body to a village overnight but the journey turns to be far from eventless than he expected when two peculiar passengers join him and his dead passenger.

_Bitter Sea_ / Fateme Ahmadi / 15 min. – A single immigrant mother struggles hard to build a decent life for her young daughter hiding away the extremes she has to go through to keep their small life in one piece.

event_name: Opékání špekáčků na Heřmaňáku – Heřmaňák otevírá
description: Otevření sezony na částečně bezobalovém farmářském tržišti Heřmaňák, na Řezáčově náměstí v Praze 7 bude zahájeno opékáním kvalitních masových špekáčků uzenářství Loužeckých na otevřeném ohni. Bodáky k opékání, špekáčky, chléb a hořčice apod. budeme mít pro vás na místě. Nenechte si ujít lednovou opékačku uprostřed holešovické činžovní zástavby! Kdo budeš mít vlastní talířek, máš slevu 5,- Kč! Přijďte se potkat!

Autor: Christopher Hampton
Režisér: Jakub Čermák
Umělci: Daniel Krejčík, Matěj Stropnický, Sandra Nováková

Pragueshorts, in collaboration with Aeroškola, presents the fifth annual selection of films for children aged four to eight. As in the past, we have chosen eight films for our selection, with this year’s films coming from the Czech Republic, Australia, Russia, and Norway, among others. What adventures await a hungry bear? What sort of love can blossom in a lost-and-found box, and where will a wolf's paths take us? Come and learn the answers to all these questions! The screenings are followed by art and drama workshops.

A clumsy crochet dinosaur must unravel itself to save the love of its life.
Režisér: Andrew Goldsmith,Bradley Slabe

All is quiet in the pastry shop after closing time… until the first cake wakes up, that is. Then all kinds of wonderful things can happen, like when a restless meringue makes friends with a kind-hearted chocolate wedge.
Režisér: Maris Brinkmanis

Režisér: Noemi Valentíny, Vojtěch Dočkal
Umělci: Noemi Valentíny, Vojtěch Dočkal

A little gnome wants nothing more than a peaceful moment in the sun in order to catch a tan, and the last thing he needs is a cloudy sky. It's time for action… now!
Režisér: Filip Diviak, Zuzana Čupová

Merry music will make any zebra dance. And when a zebra dances, so do its stripes. But watch out: they might start doing what they want, like change into a tiger or a caterpillar. Come dance to the rhythm and let yourself be surprised by all the things that can happen on the screen!
Režisér: Maria Koneva
Režisér: Kateřina Karhánková, Alexandra Májová

Two adventurous lemurs navigate their dirigibles halfway around the world to a place where happenstance and fate threaten to disrupt their reunion.
Režisér: Mark C. Smith

_Rascals Drink'n'Draw_ is an event mainly for videogames or film professionals and art students who would like to get better in their craft. Under our Art Director guidance you would be able to try out different poses, lighting exercises and time-stamped "shorts" for quick sketches. And if you tire of drawing and sketching you can always exchange tips and news with others over some good beer or wine!

Based on the best-selling pair of memoirs from father and son David and Nic Sheff, Beautiful Boy chronicles the heartbreaking and inspiring experience of survival, relapse, and recovery in a family coping with addiction over many years.
Režisér: Felix Van Groeningen
Umělci: Steve Carell, Timothée Chalamet, Maura Tierney, Kaitlyn Dever, Amy Ryan, Christian Convery, Oakley Bull, Stefanie Scott, Jack Dylan Grazer, Amy Forsyth, Andre Royo, Timothy Hutton, Carlton Wilborn, Tom Choi, Sam Dillon, Rodney J. Hobbs, Seann Gallagher, Tom Beyer, David Mendenhall, Julian Works, Kue Lawrence

The controversial group Slovenskí branci (Slovak Conscripts) recruits young men from across Slovakia. Is this just an innocent game of playing soldiers? Or is it a militia flirting with extremism that presents a security threat? Eighteen-year-old Peter Švrček lives with his parents and, at first glance, is not different from his peers. However, he feels that he is a patriot and several years ago established the organisation Slovenskí branci (Slovak Conscripts). Over 200 young men looking for guidance and their own identity have gone through the intensive military training he provides in the middle of Slovakia’s forests “to defend and preserve the nation”. Dressed in cammies and carrying machine gun mock-ups, they subject themselves to Peter’s authoritative tendencies. Peter believes that his organisation has a future. He plans to one day set aside his uniform and address the masses as a politician. This documentary, presenting the disturbing rise of nationalism in Slovakia and how power functions, premiered at the _Berlinale Film Festival_.
Režisér: Jan Gebert
Umělci: Peter Švrček, Ján Dováľ, Samuel Pastorek, Peter Cyprian

event_name: Asterix: The Secret of the Magic Potion
description:
Following a fall during mistletoe picking, Druid Panoramix decides that it is time to secure the future of the village. Accompanied by Asterix and Obelix, he undertakes to travel the Gallic world in search of a talented young druid to transmit the Secret of the Magic Potion .
Režisér: Alexandre Astier, Louis Clichy
Umělci: Christian Clavier, Guillaume Briat, Alex Lutz, Alexandre Astier, Elie Semoun, Daniel Mesguich, Bernard Alane, François Morel, Lionnel Astier, Florence Foresti

The most personal project to date from Academy Award (R)-winning director and writer Alfonso Cuarón (_Gravity, Children of Men, Y Tu Mama Tambien_), _Roma_ follows Cleo (Yalitza Aparicio), a young domestic worker for a family in the middle-class neighborhood of Roma in Mexico City. Delivering an artful love letter to the women who raised him, Cuarón draws on his own childhood to create a vivid and emotional portrait of domestic strife and social hierarchy amidst political turmoil of the 1970s.
Režisér: Alfonso Cuarón
Umělci: Yalitza Aparicio, Marina de Tavira, Diego Cortina Autrey, Carlos Peralta, Marco Graf, Daniela Demesa, Nancy García García, Verónica García, Andy Cortés, Fernando Grediaga, Jorge Antonio Guerrero

description:
The ultra-funny mime and comedian Trygve Wakenshaw returns to Jatka78. His last show, _Trygve vs Baby_, tried to reveal who was funnier: a professional actor or a small child. He has collaborated with Thomas Monckton on _Cabaret Bears Costume_. Thomas's _Pianist_ and _The Artist_ are some of the most legendary performances that took place in Slaughterhouse78. In this new Trygve project, you will also meet other talented artists who will be invited to create something they have never done before, and will probably never do again. The performance concept is based on improvisation, so it never really happens that this show is always the same. You will never see some parts of the performance again, and others you may never want to.
Autor: Trygve Wakenshaw
Režisér: Trygve Wakenshaw
Umělci: Trygve Wakenshaw, Thomas Monckton

Early summer. In a village in northern Turkey, Lale and her four sisters are walking home from school, playing innocently with some boys. The immorality of their play sets off a scandal that has unexpected consequences. The family home is progressively transformed into a prison; instruction in homemaking replaces school and marriages start being arranged. The five sisters who share a common passion for freedom, find ways of getting around the constraints imposed on them.

For the exhibition _Infinity Pool_, Catherine Biocca has created an immersive and ever-expanding environment that challenges our depth perception as well as the seemingly unshakeable relationship between the object and the viewer. Through sculptural installation, painting, and video animations, Infinity Pool presents various dimensional layers of which the exhibition viewer becomes an immediate and involuntary part of.

Seemingly inanimate at first glance, Biocca’s anthropomorphized aquatic characters converse and judge their surroundings, reveal their anxieties and desires, and make plans for later. Sculptural references to historical triumphs are worn down and repurposed, at best hanging on to their decorative qualities. With omniscience stripped and communication lines opened, Infinity Pool invites the viewer to jump head first into the fishbowl.

There is something remarkably soothing about staring into a fish bowl or an aquarium. While passively gazing upon the contained aqueous life forms bobbing back and forth, the depths and mysteries of the sea are smoothly domesticized and shrunken down to the size of a TV screen. The certain calm perhaps emanates from the unquestioned, unchallenged roles of viewer and object, the feeling of one’s ability to see everything, and engage or disengage at will.

event_name: Perforated cinema: Adventures in the garden
location: Alfred ve dvoře, Františka Křížka 36, Praha 7
description:
A clanging, flashing story of one summer that lights up Grandmother’s garden and rattles and shakes from inside Grandfather’s shed. An audiovisual performance for people tall and small that will take you to unknown earthly realms and cosmic expanses. _This year, I traveled neither to the Amazon rainforest nor to the Kalahari Desert. I spent my vacation with my grandparents at their country home. While there, I came across an old camera – and set out on a journey. All at once, the junk in Grandpa’s shed, the healing herbs, and the little pond in the garden became distant corners of the world, full of dancing lights and shadows, unfamiliar sounds and echoes, playful reflections and sudden flashes. Here and there, a ginger cat got in my way, but at times I couldn’t have got down without its help. With all the photographs that I took on my journeys, I put together the story that I want to show you now._
Umělecké skupiny: Ryba řvoucí

description:
*On the occasion of Eva Jiricna's jubilee, a retrospective exhibition of the world-famous Czech architect will take place, presenting work from her professional beginnings to the present day.*

The aim of the multimedia exhibition is to introduce the development process and the realization of individual projects of Eva Jiřičná's, as well as the sources of their inspiration. There will be exhibited parts of original projects and documentation about their fulfillment, their architectural models, and examples of interior design and film projections associated with the life and work of Eva Jiřičná. The original monumental glass staircase created for the interior of the Parisian branch of Joan & David's shop in 1994 will also be reinstalled in the exhibition. .

Eva Jiřičná (* 1939) is the world's most respected architect of Czech origin. She became a prominent representative of the high tech style, but in her work we also find echoes of organic or minimalist architecture, which continually emphasizes the application of glass and metal in bold constructions that allow a flood of natural light into the interior of buildings. It is characterized by its shapely elegance, lightness of expression, but also the harmony between form and function. It focuses on the detailed elaboration of all technical elements that are beautiful in their utility. She is inspired by technique and nature in design, combining rational approach with involvement of intuition. This architectural versatility is typical for Eva Jiřičná. It takes the form of interiors and family houses, designs public buildings of various orientations, including a library, hotel, school, congress center, and transport terminal.

Letos se již pošesté sejdou v Praze 7 maškary, které se nebojí užít si svět naruby. Sraz účastníků bude v sobotu 2. března v 10 hodin na Strossmayerově náměstí před kostelem sv. Antonína. Specifikou sedmičkového masopustního průvodu je obchůzka maškar po kulturních institucích, kde je čeká kulturní pohoštění. Po desáté hodině převezme  před kostelem sv. Antonína za zvuků masopustní muziky Bakchus z rukou starosty masopustní právo. Poté průvod s muzikou zamíří po ulici Milady Horákové k Národnímu technickému muzeu, před kterým se odehraje vystoupení Masopustní etudy chůdařů Long Vehicle Circus, kteří zvládají akrobacii, pantomimu i klaunství. Následuje zastavení v hlavní expozici NTM a poté se průvod přesune do Národního zemědělského muzea, kde bude po celé odpoledne k dispozici nabídka tradičních masopustních pokrmů. Zahraje zde také flašinetář, harmonikář i další muzikanti. Vzhledem k typu akce není možné předem přesně určit příchod průvodu, proto bude začátek jednotlivých vystoupení uveden až na místě. Na začátku programu v NZM se můžete těšit na české lidové tance, které předvede Folklorní spolek Bejvávalo z Domu dětí a mládeže Prahy 7. Pro děti jsou připraveny tři pohádky. Herci studia Damúza zahrají představení Z tajného deníku Smolíčka Pé. Do příběhu dalšího představení, nazvaného Pohádky pana Pohádky, mohou aktivně vstoupit i děti. Třetí divadlo má název Tak trochu masopustní pohádka… V NZM bude probíhat nejen výstava Barbory Bálkové Masky, ale také výstava fotografií z minulých Letenských masopustů. Svoji tvorbu kostýmů a masek představí studenti SPŠ oděvní z Prahy 7. Kolem páté bude následovat přesun do Vodárenské věže, před kterou proběhne odsouzení, symbolické zahubení a oplakávání Bakcha a prohlídka expozice Rozhledny ve věži. Od 180 hodin jste zváni do expozice loutek a rodinných loutkových divadel v Galerii Scarabeus a do Muzea kávy Alchymista v ulici Jana Zajíce 7 za Spartou, kde vás čeká prohlídka expozic a hra s loutkami. Masopustní den zde zakončí v 19 hodin hudební vystoupení Masopust juž nastal! aneb Český barokní carneval. Zpívá a na dobové nástroje zahraje soubor Ritornello. Do NTM, NZM, Vodárenské věže, Muzea kávy a Galerie Scarabeus mají maškary vstup zdarma. 

PROGRAM

Tvořivá dílna masek bude v sobotu 23. února od 13 do 17 hodin na Letné v Galerii Scarabeus, Jana Zajíce 7.

Ateliér je určen pro dospělé a děti od pěti let. Doporučujeme pracovní oděv.

Kontakt: Kateřina Ebelová, 603 552 758, scarabeus@galeriescarabeus.cz.

As the personal advisor to presidential candidate Michal Horáček, documentary filmmaker Robin Kvapil recorded from behind the scenes of the campaign from autumn 2016. He filmed using anything he could get his hands on - camera, mobile phone, notebook computer. The film, co-directed by Radim Procházka, was an attempt to capture an authentic portrait of Horáček’s election campaign, presenting his team’s tactics, interactions with both supporters and opponents, with journalists, as well as with opposing candidates. With an awareness that they had most likely lost the election, but that there was still a long path ahead of them, Kvapil presented a reflection of their teamwork, commenting on their individual steps.
Režisér: Radim Procházka, Robin Kvapil
Umělci: Michal Horáček, Robin Kvapil, Jiří Drahoš, Miloš Zeman, Jiří Ovčáček, Jaromír Soukup

As the personal advisor to presidential candidate Michal Horáček, documentary filmmaker Robin Kvapil recorded from behind the scenes of the campaign from autumn 2016. He filmed using anything he could get his hands on - camera, mobile phone, notebook computer. The film, co-directed by Radim Procházka, was an attempt to capture an authentic portrait of Horáček’s election campaign, presenting his team’s tactics, interactions with both supporters and opponents, with journalists, as well as with opposing candidates. With an awareness that they had most likely lost the election, but that there was still a long path ahead of them, Kvapil presented a reflection of their teamwork, commenting on their individual steps.
Režisér: Radim Procházka, Robin Kvapil
Umělci: Michal Horáček, Robin Kvapil, Jiří Drahoš, Miloš Zeman, Jiří Ovčáček, Jaromír Soukup

Alfred ve dvoře, Františka Křížka 36, Praha 7
Alfred ve dvoře, Františka Křížka 36, Praha 7
description:
In this darkly atmospheric solo performance, Beckett drama meets Defoe's Robinson Crusoe meets Jack London's Star Rover. A glimpse into an obscure urban castaway's intimate universe: despite basic animal needs he survives, in the wasteland of his room, a universe enclosed by four walls. He has survived life, yet keeps on living - with no Fridays and no weekends. A performance free of unnecessary guideposts on how to understand things. _"Life is spirit, and spirit cannot die. Only the flesh dies and passes, ever acrawl with the chemic ferment that informs it, ever plastic, ever crystallizing, only to melt into the flux and to crystallize into fresh and diverse forms that are ephemeral and that melt back into the flux._ _Spirit alone endures and continues to build upon itself through successive and endless incarnations as it works upward toward the light."_ - Jack London, The Star Rover
Umělecké skupiny: Wariot Ideal
Autor: Jan Dörner, Milena Dörnerová, Jan Kalivoda, Vojtěch Švejda
Umělci: Jan Dörner / Jan Kalivoda / Vojtěch Švejda

event_name: Arcadia + Manu Delago short film: Parasol Peak
description:
_Arcadia_ / Paul Wright / United Kingdom / 2017 / 78 min. – 100 years of archival footage in the guise of an experimental film. The magic, charm, and disorder of rural life. Cinematic memories of folk festivals, masked processions, sowing, and harvesting. The electro-acoustic music helps to define this film essay, showing the beauty, brutality, and madness of rural Britain. *Short film:* _Parasol Peak_ / Johannes Aitzetmüller & Jeb Hardwick / Austria 2017 / 30 min., no dialogues – Pioneer of the hang (handpan), captivating musician Manu Delago has announced the forthcoming release of a unique and awe-inspiring movie and accompanying album, Parasol Peak, in which Delago leads an ensemble of 7 musicians on a mountaineering expedition in The Alps. Along the way, the group performs a collection of brand new compositions in different locations and at varying altitudes.
Režisér: Paul Wright

event_name: Festival Spectaculare: Hatti Vatti + Midub + more
description:
The Polish producer Hatti Vatti a.k.a. Piotr Kaliński will bring a unique mix of ambient, autonomous and "smart" electronics, combined in a sophisticated live performance. His atmospheric downtempo, sophisticated and detailed, will fill the top floor of the Cross Club. During the evening, a local Prague-based discovery – the project Midub – will introduce their depiction of progressive electronic music with references to dub techno and ambient. They will be followed up by the DJ set of the British duo Kiyoko, a joint project of Manchester-based producers Joe McBride (Synkro) and Jack Lever (Bering Strait) accompanied by the local stager, Nitrous. The bottom floor of the club will be dominated by flat beats and talented DJs: Eva Porating, an established DJ of Slovak origin and an Ankali club resident, the eclectic DJ Advance Martin, and the evening will be wind up by the Prague's upcoming DJ, Ariana, who will serve her selection of upright techno.
Umělecké skupiny: Hatti VattiMidubKiyokoNitrousEva PoratingDJ ArianaAdvance Martin

Music, art and chaos in the wild West-Berlin of the 1980s. The walled-in city became the creative melting pot for sub- and pop-culture. Before the iron curtain fell, anything and everything seemed possible. _B-MOVIE_ is a fast-paced collage of mostly unreleased film and TV footage from a frenzied but creative decade, starting with punk and ending with the Love Parade, in a city where the days are short and the nights are endless. Where it was not about long-term success, but about living for the moment - the here and now.
Režisér: Jörg A. Hoppe, Heiko Lange, Klaus Maeck
Umělci: Blixa Bargeld

_Nausea_ is a poetic-scientific performance, a live documentary about the sea visualized by means of shadows, projections and reflections. The soundtrack is played from a reel-to-reel recorder and several analogue projectors cast extra layers on the screen. The used lamplights throw dancing shadows on the roof and walls, making the whole space move.
Režisér: Oona Libens
Umělci: Onna Libens, Veronika Svobodová

Richard Eyre’s stunning new production of Bizet’s opera was the talk of the town when it was unveiled on New Year’s Eve 2009. Elīna Garanča leads the cast as the iconic gypsy of the title—a woman desired by every man but determined to remain true to herself. Roberto Alagna is Don José, the soldier who falls under her spell and sacrifices everything for her love, only to be cast aside when the toreador Escamillo (Teddy Tahu Rhodes) piques Carmen’s interest. With dances created by star choreographer Christopher Wheeldon and conducted by rising maestro Yannick Nézet-Séguin, this Carmen brings every aspect of Bizet’s tale to thrilling life, from its lighthearted beginning to its inevitably tragic climax.

Broadcast live from London’s West End, see Ian McKellen’s ‘extraordinarily moving portrayal’ (Independent) of King Lear in cinemas. Chichester Festival Theatre’s production received five-star reviews for its sell-out run, and transfers to the West End for a limited season. Jonathan Munby directs this ‘nuanced and powerful’ (The Times) contemporary retelling of Shakespeare’s tender, violent, moving and shocking play. Considered by many to be the greatest tragedy ever written, King Lear sees two ageing fathers – one a King, one his courtier – reject the children who truly love them. Their blindness unleashes a tornado of pitiless ambition and treachery, as family and state are plunged into a violent power struggle with bitter ends.
Režisér: Jonathan Munby
Umělci: Ian McKellen
Setkání občanů

natáčení spotu „Scala“
natáčení dokumentu pro Policii ČR

_Rascals Drink'n'Draw_ is an event mainly for videogames or film professionals and art students who would like to get better in their craft. Under our Art Director guidance you would be able to try out different poses, lighting exercises and time-stamped "shorts" for quick sketches. And if you tire of drawing and sketching you can always exchange tips and news with others over some good beer or wine!

Asghar Farhadi’s eighth offering Everybody Knows, which opened this year’s festival in Cannes, is another of his films to illustrate the complexities of human relationships and their ultimate transformation. Laura, a Spanish woman living in Buenos Aires with her husband and children, hardly ever goes back to her native country. The events that unfold on her final visit there change everyone’s lives. A sharply honed family drama starring the outstanding Penélope Cruz and Javier Bardem.
Režisér: Asghar Farhadi
Umělci: Javier Bardem, Penélope Cruz, Ricardo Darín, Bárbara Lennie, Inma Cuesta, Eduard Fernández, Elvira Mínguez, Roger Casamajor, Ramón Barea, Carla Campra

A look at the life of the astronaut, Neil Armstrong, and the legendary space mission that led him to become the first man to walk on the Moon on July 20, 1969.
Režisér: Damien Chazelle
Umělci: Ryan Gosling, Claire Foy, Corey Stoll, Jon Bernthal, Pablo Schreiber, Jason Clarke, Kyle Chandler, Shea Whigham, Christopher Abbott, Patrick Fugit, Lukas Haas, Cory Michael Smith, Brian D’Arcy James, Brady Smith, Olivia Hamilton, J.D. Evermore, Anna Chazelle, Mark Kelly, Steve Coulter, Kris Swanberg, William Gregory Lee, Philip Boyd, James R. Hansen

Based on the best-selling pair of memoirs from father and son David and Nic Sheff, Beautiful Boy chronicles the heartbreaking and inspiring experience of survival, relapse, and recovery in a family coping with addiction over many years.
Režisér: Felix Van Groeningen
Umělci: Steve Carell, Timothée Chalamet, Maura Tierney, Kaitlyn Dever, Amy Ryan, Christian Convery, Oakley Bull, Stefanie Scott, Jack Dylan Grazer, Amy Forsyth, Andre Royo, Timothy Hutton, Carlton Wilborn, Tom Choi, Sam Dillon, Rodney J. Hobbs, Seann Gallagher, Tom Beyer, David Mendenhall, Julian Works, Kue Lawrence

Halla, a woman in her fifties, declares war on the local aluminum industry to prevent it from disfiguring her country. She risks all she has to protect the highlands of Iceland-but the situation could change with the unexpected arrival of a small orphan in her life.
Režisér: Benedikt Erlingsson
Umělci: Halldóra Geirharðsdóttir, Jóhann Sigurðarson, Juan Camillo Roman Estrada, Jörundur Ragnarsson, Olena Lavreňuk, Vala Kristín Eiríksdóttir, Halldór Halldórsson, Saga Garðarsdóttir

A series of mysterious disappearances in 1987 are all eerily connected to the same person.
Režisér: Christoffer Boe
Umělci: Nikolaj Lie Kaas, Fares Fares, Søren Pilmark, Johanne Louise Schmidt, Fanny Bornedal, Clara Rosager, Michael Brostrup, Nicolas Bro, Anders Hove, Elliott Crosset Hove, Vibeke Hastrup, Diêm Camille Gbogou, Anders Juul, Birthe Neumann, Luise Skov

The captivating story of the band Queen, his music and amazing vocalist Freddie Mercury, who has broken stereotypes and conventions, won the worship of countless fans. The film shows the brilliant career of the band, which, thanks to iconic songs and revolutionary sound, climbed to the heights of fame until Mercury's scandalous lifestyle did not put everything into question
Režisér: Bryan Singer
Umělci: Rami Malek, Joseph Mazzello, Gwilym Lee, Ben Hardy, Allen Leech

In early 18th century England, a frail Queen Anne (Colman) occupies the throne and her close friend Lady Sarah (Weisz) governs the country in her stead. When a new servant Abigail (Stone) arrives, her charm endears her to Sarah.
Režisér: Yorgos Lanthimos
Umělci: Olivia Colman, Rachel Weisz, Emma Stone, Nicholas Hoult, Joe Alwyn, Mark Gatiss, Wilson Radjou-Pujalte, Basil Eidenbenz, Alfrun Rose, Isaura Barbé-Brown

The most personal project to date from Academy Award (R)-winning director and writer Alfonso Cuarón (_Gravity, Children of Men, Y Tu Mama Tambien_), _Roma_ follows Cleo (Yalitza Aparicio), a young domestic worker for a family in the middle-class neighborhood of Roma in Mexico City. Delivering an artful love letter to the women who raised him, Cuarón draws on his own childhood to create a vivid and emotional portrait of domestic strife and social hierarchy amidst political turmoil of the 1970s.
Režisér: Alfonso Cuarón
Umělci: Yalitza Aparicio, Marina de Tavira, Diego Cortina Autrey, Carlos Peralta, Marco Graf, Daniela Demesa, Nancy García García, Verónica García, Andy Cortés, Fernando Grediaga, Jorge Antonio Guerrero

Mary Stuart's attempt to overthrow her cousin Elizabeth I, Queen of England, finds her condemned to years of imprisonment before facing execution.
Režisér: Josie Rourke
Umělci: Saoirse Ronan, Margot Robbie, Guy Pearce, Gemma Chan, David Tennant, Martin Compston, Jack Lowden, Joe Alwyn, Brendan Coyle, Ismael Cruz Cordova, Eileen O'Higgins, Maria Dragus, James McArdle, Liah O'Prey, Paul Eryk Atlas

description:
_A woodsy, erotic pantomime._ Love moves mountains, but passion makes of people ... what? Those who don’t want to flash with passion, should not go to the forest! A titilating comedy full of forest fruits and desirous animals. Based on the play by the famous actress and writer Isabella Andreini _La Mirtilla_ (1588), the first preserved pastoral by the female author's pen. The third part of the dramaturgical cycle _Opus Andreini_. *With English subtitles.*

description:
A modern black farce with an unexpected finale. For the first time, the Czech premiere of _Hard Sell_ hits the stage. Translated by Petr Čepek and directed by Filip Nuckolls, the text is altered to reflect post-revolutionary realities of the 1990s. _Two policemen, one corpse, and one witness. Is he culprit or victim? Why is he silent? A brilliant comedy about how much men of the law must use their imaginations in order to bring about justice. Can they manage it?_
Umělecké skupiny: Divadlo 6-16
Režisér: Filip Nuckolls
Umělci: Kryštof Rímský, Jan Jankovský, Jana Polášková

_What can keep you alive when the whole world stands against you?_ Ema Černá, child hero, the new production of Viktor Tauš, based on a true story, can eventually overcome this situation. The most essential part of the will to survive is true belief in oneself, the belief that somewhere, perhaps in America, someone waits who cares for you.
Autor: David Jařab, Evita Naušová
Režisér: Viktor Tauš
Umělci: Tereza Voříšková, Eliška Křenková

event_name: UpTONE: Kelvin Jones + support: René Miller
description:
Kelvin Jones is a british singer and songwriter, who comes from Zimbabwe. He performed with artists like X Ambassadors, James Morrison or Belgian singer Milow, with whom he came to Prague in 2016. Three years later he is coming back with _UpTone_ series, when he will be performing in Cross club at 14 April.
Umělecké skupiny: Kelvin JonesFource Entertainment CZRené Miller

*A movement-circus humoresque inspired by Vladislav Vančura’s novel Summer of Caprice.* Let the atmosphere of the old days blow a little fresh breeze to your face. Those were the times when men looked after their health and body cleanliness in outdoor swimming pools. When a most charming girl enters the scene, a story is triggered that is impossible to stop. The world you are going to see is playful because playing comes before action. Get ready for juggling, rope walking, pair acrobatics, mysteries, humor and a show to take your breath away.
Umělecké skupiny: Brothers in Trick
Autor: Vladislav Vančura, Veronika Riedlbauchová
Režisér: Veronika Riedlbauchová
Umělci: Adam Jarchovský, Václav Jelínek a Kristýna Vlčková

*Stage radio report about the discovery of a crazy Czech band Proton, which was silenced just before it became famous.* Striking story of a forgotten musical legend from which the giants of both popular music and underground have been awaiting much more. With the musical star of the dark sky of deep normalisation, there is an unbelievable amount of incredible stories of contemporary musicians.
Umělecké skupiny: Vosto5
Autor: Ondřej Cihlář a Petr Marek
Režisér: Ondřej Cihlář
Umělci: Ondřej Bauer, Ondřej Cihlář, Jiří Havelka / Robert Mikluš, Tomina Jeřábek, Petr Marek, Petr Prokop a Bára Mišíková

_Breakdown – a part of our lives, everyday experience that ruins and crushes us. Breakdown also constructs, hardens, strengthens or just routinely returns without us noticing and realizing its presence. Without breakdown it is impossible to push one’s limits, to leap forward, it is impossible to jump over one’s shadow. We are interested in the character of breakdown, what it does to an individual and whole society._
Umělecké skupiny: Losers Cirque Company
Autor: Petr Horníček, Tomsa Legierski, Matyáš Ramba
Režisér: Tomsa Legierski
Umělci: Petr Horníček, Lukáš Macháček, Matyáš Ramba, Vítězslav Ramba, Jana Telcová, Kristýna Stránská, Martina Illichová, Nikola Kopáčová, Ondřej Sochůrek, Jiří Bělka, Josefina Žampová, Vladimír Mikláš

location: DOX Centrum současného umění, Poupětova 1, Praha 7
description:
_We hit the bank, we will not drown, we will just remain mad. Just strange. Memory, a handful of coins in a burning lake. And naked unprotected desire. Become a rock, not feel._ – Anna Ondrejková, fragment They set off on a journey. From fear. With no guarantees. The paths of three people intersect. Connected to each other, they overcome a region of anxiety, courage, failure and compassion. They seek shelter in an indifferent world. When there is nowhere to return to, all that is left is to be awakened. The performance was inspired by interviews with a community of young people living in London who while on the run experienced a limit situation. A stage composition balanced on the border between physical theatre and concert featuring seven exceptional musical and dance performers. *Created by:* Andrej Petrovič, Rin Kin, Minh - Hieu Nguyen, Hana Varadzinová, Viliam Dočolomanský

location: Alfred ve dvoře, Františka Křížka 36, Praha 7
description:
This international collective whirls together new music, movement and imagery in an intermedial performance on history's endless rotation. _Everywhen_ orbits around two sides of life - the personal and the political. An often caring, gentle and well-meaning personal life is contrasted here with the reality of the social individual, who can often be sinister, vengeful and hateful. But how can we be critical to our own world views when they are created by those closest to us? A woman as loving mother who also promotes murder and slavery; a loving couple involved in the propaganda of a perverse ideology; kids that give a fascist salute as if in play. Something is wrong in these scenes. Images of everyday families, mums and dads with their children, tiny groups of people, close to each other, face to face with the threat of history repeating itself. Our memories often surface suddenly, changed, idealized, and sometimes they even erase themselves spontaneously. By leaving out key events and rewriting history a barrier is built between the new generation and older people, and this is makes it too easy for history to repeat itself. Is it even possible to stop history from repeating itself when ideology is written into the body like DNA? An intimate situation in a frightfully familiar context.
Autor: Soňa Ferienčíková, Mária Júdová, Alexandra Timpau

Tel Aviv's central bus station is one of the largest in the world. But the seven-storey concrete complex is straight out of a Kafka novel. People get lost here and the sixth floor is totally missing. Yonathan is able to navigate the maze of endless corridors, staircases and hidden rooms like no one else. The bus station and its incomprehensibility have become the meaning of life for him; in it he has found the perfect metaphor for his homeland, to which he has a complicated relationship. He accompanies tourists through the bowels of this extensive and illogically designed building, sharing with them the secrets it has revealed. And he meets a very diverse society – among the patrolling soldiers there are wandering African asylum seekers, Philippine salesmen and Orthodox Jews. This visually exhilarating and inventively edited film captures a closed world that works according to its own rules.
Režisér: Tomáš Elšík

Umělecké skupiny: Squadra Sua
Umělci: O humoru: Lukáš Houdek, Petr Jarčevský; Absolutely: Roman Horák, Robert Janč

The ultra-funny mime and comedian Trygve Wakenshaw returns to Jatka78. His last show, _Trygve vs Baby_, tried to reveal who was funnier: a professional actor or a small child. He has collaborated with Thomas Monckton on _Cabaret Bears Costume_. Thomas's _Pianist_ and _The Artist_ are some of the most legendary performances that took place in Slaughterhouse78. In this new Trygve project, you will also meet other talented artists who will be invited to create something they have never done before, and will probably never do again. The performance concept is based on improvisation, so it never really happens that this show is always the same. You will never see some parts of the performance again, and others you may never want to.
Autor: Trygve Wakenshaw
Režisér: Trygve Wakenshaw
Umělci: Trygve Wakenshaw, Thomas Monckton

location: DOX Centrum současného umění, Poupětova 1, Praha 7
description:
How does a company's "data" influence our eating habits? How does this data change the form and content of our bodies, or how we relate to our environment?

It helps us know data and statistics while building our everyday lives around food - what we eat and grow, where we buy, how we cook and with whom we share meals. But are these statistics accurate, and do they reflect reality as it is, or do they construct it? Who is shaping them, who has access to them, how can we use them, and who can “use” us through them? What technologies for data optimization are available on the market, what are the benefits and risks for end-users?

*Guests:*
- Markéta Dolejšová - Designer and researcher dealing with, inter alia, the question of how new technology affects our relationship with food, the author of the Materie project
- Bára Kebová - Saving Rescue Platformer, author of the Fairdining project
- Jakub Krejcik - founder and CEO of Heaven Labs, which manufactures MANA products

Tereza Lišková, the Editor-in-Chief of the _Material Times_ magazine, will accompany the debate.

event_name: How to Drown Dr. Mracek, the Lawyer
description:
There are still water spirits among us. One group lives in Prague, led by Mr. Wassermann, who is using his wife's family as servants. All they need is their old house near the river. But the house is to be demolished. They have to stop it. And the only way is to drown Dr. Mrácek, who is responsible for the demolition. But he falls in love with Wassermann's niece Jana. He changes to a fish, is mistaken for the water spirit from Germany, is drowned and revived again. The other problem is the flour with ears... and so on...
Režisér: Václav Vorlíček
Umělci: Libuše Šafránková, Jaromír Hanzlík, František Filipovský, Miloš Kopecký, Vladimír Menšík, Zdeněk Řehoř, Stella Zázvorková, Eva Trejtnarová-Hudečková, Čestmír Řanda st., Míla Myslíková, Vlastimil Hašek, Jiří Hrzán, Miroslav Masopust, Gabriela Wilhelmová, Dáša Neblechová, Milena Steinmasslová, Lucie Žulová, Jiří Lír, Lubomír Kostelk

Umělci: Viggo Mortensen, Mahershala Ali, Linda Cardellini, Sebastian Maniscalco, Dimetter D.Marinov, Mike Hatton, Joe Cortese

The invincible agent Cyril Juan Borguette alias W4C (Jan Kacer) has been assigned a mission to go to a hotel in Prague, get hold of a saltcellar with a plan for the military exploitation of Venus hidden in it, and hand it over to the beautiful agent Alice (Kveta Fialová). He will have to compete for the saltcellar with other agents working for the world's various greater and smaller powers. The head of the Prague counter-intelligence unit gets news of agent W4C's mission. Deficient in personnel, he nominates accountant Foustka (Jirí Sovák) as agent 13B. Mr Foustka takes his dog Pajda with him and the two head for the airport. Pajda helps him track down agent W4C in a classy hotel that becomes the battleground for the interests and plans of the secret agents from different countries, each trying to get hold of the precious saltcellar.
Režisér: Václav Vorlíček
Umělci: Jan Kačer, Květa Fialová, Jiří Sovák, Jan Libíček, Jiří Pleskot, Jiří Lír, Jaroslav Kepka, Václav Kotva, Zdeněk Blažek, Zdeněk Braunschläger, Jaroslav Cmíral, Ivo Gübel, Josef Hlinomaz, Karel Hovorka st., Eduard Pavlíček, Vladimír Pospíšil, Svatopluk Skládal, Jaroslav Tomsa, Oldřich Velen

"What if someone had an absurd dream and the visions ran out in the street?" a scientist asks Rose, a researcher who discovers a way to engender beneficial dreams (to produce contented, productive workers). There's a problem: after an injection of her elixir, dream elements become real. Rose learns this after dosing her husband Henry to stop his dreaming about Jessie, a curvaceous comic-book heroine who has anti-gravitational gloves he needs to study so he can solve a problem at the factory where he's chief engineer: Henry wakes up with Jessie asleep next to him pursued by a cowboy and a super hero. Jealousy consumes Rose. All this plus satire aimed at the Czechoslovak state.
Režisér: Václav Vorlíček
Umělci: Dana Medřická, Olga Schoberová, Jiří Sovák

There she meets the friendly Peter who takes her with him to school... and the adventures begin.

Permanent exhibition of the NTM _Sugar and Chocolate_ is devoted to Czech sugar production industry. Sugar was a very strategical resource for Czechoslovakia and its production also had political influence that is the reason why the sugar was also called “Whiten Gold”. In addition magnates of sugar production industry funded the construction of NTM building in 1908.
Režisér: Tereza Kopáčová

100 years of archival footage in the guise of an experimental film. The magic, charm, and disorder of rural life. Cinematic memories of folk festivals, masked processions, sowing, and harvesting. The electro-acoustic music helps to define this film essay showing the beauty, brutality, and madness of rural Britain.
Režisér: Paul Wright

*A dance-acrobatic show based on a book by Richard Bach Jonathan Livingston Seagull.* The creators of this performance was inspired by the main plot of the book, the seagull surpass himself thanks to his passion for flight, learning everything he can about flying and than encouraging others to do the same. The audience will witness a path of a man who wants something bigger than everybody else, who’s full of passion for flight. Thanks to the fire and determination the man is able to push the limits and move the boundaries of what he can or cannot do. The main character in this performance is not afraid of failing, he keeps trying new techniques and discovers what his body is capable of. He jumps and falls, again and again.

Asghar Farhadi’s eighth offering Everybody Knows, which opened this year’s festival in Cannes, is another of his films to illustrate the complexities of human relationships and their ultimate transformation. Laura, a Spanish woman living in Buenos Aires with her husband and children, hardly ever goes back to her native country. The events that unfold on her final visit there change everyone’s lives. A sharply honed family drama starring the outstanding Penélope Cruz and Javier Bardem.
Režisér: Asghar Farhadi
Umělci: Javier Bardem, Penélope Cruz, Ricardo Darín, Bárbara Lennie, Inma Cuesta, Eduard Fernández, Elvira Mínguez, Roger Casamajor, Ramón Barea, Carla Campra

The most personal project to date from Academy Award (R)-winning director and writer Alfonso Cuarón (_Gravity, Children of Men, Y Tu Mama Tambien_), _Roma_ follows Cleo (Yalitza Aparicio), a young domestic worker for a family in the middle-class neighborhood of Roma in Mexico City. Delivering an artful love letter to the women who raised him, Cuarón draws on his own childhood to create a vivid and emotional portrait of domestic strife and social hierarchy amidst political turmoil of the 1970s.
Režisér: Alfonso Cuarón
Umělci: Yalitza Aparicio, Marina de Tavira, Diego Cortina Autrey, Carlos Peralta, Marco Graf, Daniela Demesa, Nancy García García, Verónica García, Andy Cortés, Fernando Grediaga, Jorge Antonio Guerrero

The captivating story of the band Queen, his music and amazing vocalist Freddie Mercury, who has broken stereotypes and conventions, won the worship of countless fans. The film shows the brilliant career of the band, which, thanks to iconic songs and revolutionary sound, climbed to the heights of fame until Mercury's scandalous lifestyle did not put everything into question
Režisér: Bryan Singer
Umělci: Rami Malek, Joseph Mazzello, Gwilym Lee, Ben Hardy, Allen Leech
